Hi Friends,

Need help in identifying the name of the test case in jUnit.

I am running some tests through the Suite in jUnit and from the TestResult I
want to know the name of the (TestCase)testFunction that was executed. Do we
have anything like this available in jUnit from which we can identify the
TestCase which is being run in the suite.

	TestResult t= new TestResult();
	t = junit.textui.TestRunner.run(tc.doTest());

Any advice will be highly appreciated.

Regards

Vipul Gupta
Software Development Engineer - QA
Barco | Control Rooms
India
